message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000.  It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 isn't quite enough for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500, which is still a great value for you.  Let's see if we can make this work.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not able to meet at $10,500. My maximum budget remains at $9,500. I hope this revised offer is more in line with my budget.
